title: Pixel 1, Microphone, heaphone working intermittently. Battery draining fast.
content:
Tried factory reset, and update to Q, but nothing. The mic works sometimes partly, then again not. Clearly an issue with the device / software which is internal. Will try with Lineage OS to check if it is hardware issue.

Oh, safe mode ON and screen locks all the time and screen flickers, nice.

Worst phone I have ever seen and will use Huawei or iPhone now on.

How can pure OS be so bad at handling stuff? WTF.
